text:
Jimmy Donaldson (born May 7, 1998), more commonly known as MrBeast, is an American YouTuber. He was born in Greenville, North Carolina. He was known for his expensive stunts and philanthropy. He has been seen as the creator of a new genre of YouTube videos that are expensive stunts.
He is also the co-creator of Team Trees, a fundraiser for the Arbor Day Foundation, which has raised over $22 million.
History.
Donaldson began posting videos to YouTube in 2012 at age 13, under the name of "MrBeast6000"; his early content ranged from Let's Plays to "videos estimating the wealth of other YouTubers".
